name: CO-WELL ASIA
description:
CO-WELL Asia has been growing steadily since being founded in Vietnam in 2011. More than 450 employees work in the two Vietnamese offices, located in Hanoi and Da Nang, and nearly 100 staff work in Tokyo and Miyazaki, Japan. We have undertaken more than 250 software development projects for global customers including Business Solutions, E-Commerce, AR-VR, and software testing. 80% of these projects are for large enterprise customers.
Our slogan “Behind your success” drives CO-WELL Asia to proudly be a reliable IT service provider, building a solid IT foundation on which our customers/partners optimize their businesses.
